level.text: VEST shall be directed by an Executive Director who shall be appointed by the President of UDC, with the advice and consent of the Board of Trustees of UDC.
The Executive Director shall employ staff as needed, in accordance with annual appropriations.

level.heading: History
level.text: (Oct. 26, 1974, Pub. L. 93-471, title VIII, ยง 805, as added Oct. 1, 2002, D.C. Law 14-190, ยง 2202, 49 DCR 6968.)

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 14-190
level.text: For Law 14-190, see notes following ยง 38-1208.01.
